description: "The northern regions of mid-19th century Southeast Asia are included on this map of China, with the Birman Empire (Myanmar) bordered in green, Siam (Thailand) in blue, and Cochin-China (Vietnam) in yellow. Some of the larger rivers are named."
title: "China and the Birman Empire : with parts of Cochin-China and Siam / J & C. Walker, Sculp."
